description: Retrieves overridden values for a Student Award Grouper or all Student Award Groupers                  filtered by Financial Aid Records, Student Award Item, Financial Award Year, or Sequence                  Number. If you don't specify a filter, this web service returns all Student Award                  Groupers, their COD override fields, and COD status.

Retrieves overridden values for the Student Anticipated Disbursement or all Student                  Anticipated Disbursements filtered by Disbursement COD Status, Financial Aid Award                  Year, Student Award, Academic Period, or Sequence Number. If you don't specify a filter,                  this web service returns all active disbursements, their COD override fields, and                  COD status.

Returns the class standing overrides for Financial Aid Period Records specified by                  Reference ID, or specified by student, academic period, academic unit, academic level,                  or program of study. If the request does not specify a Financial Aid Period Record                  or criteria, this operation returns information for all Financial Aid Period Records.

The Direct Loan School Account Statement (DLSAS) is provided by the Department of                  Education to schools. It helps schools compare their Direct Loan cash and disbursement                  transaction information for a given period of time with those of the Department of                  Education. This web service provides institutions a way to pull their disbursement                  records out of Workday and into Direct Loan Tools to perform the actual reconciliation                  process.
Get operation for ISIR File and ISIR Transaction data

Returns the load status overrides for Financial Aid Period Records specified by Reference                  ID, or specified by student, academic period, academic unit, academic level, or program                  of study. If the request does not specify a Financial Aid Period Record or criteria,                  this operation returns information for all Financial Aid Period Records.
Returns NSLDS Override for Financial Aid Period Record specified by Reference ID.
Web service to get Pell Crossover Financial Aid Award Year.

Returns the period details overrides for Financial Aid Period Records specified by                  Reference ID, or specified by student, academic period, academic unit, academic level,                  or program of study. If the request does not specify a Financial Aid Period Record                  or criteria, this operation returns information for all Financial Aid Period Records.
Retrieves the Programs of Study used for Enrollment for an input Financial Aid Record.
Get Student Period Record instances via Reference ID
Returns Student Aggregate Award by Reference ID, or Name and/or Amount. Returns all                  Student Aggregate Award if no Reference ID or criteria is provided.
Gets data about a Student Alternative Loan Application or all Student Alternative                  Loan Applications if a reference to one is not provided.

Returns information for Student Award Items specified in the request. If the request                  does not specify a Student Award Item, this operation returns information for all                  Student Award Items.
Gets data about a Student Loan Application or all Student Loan Applications if a reference                  to one is not provided.

Returns Student Preliminary Awards by Reference ID, or Academic Period Reference,                  Academic Person Reference and/or Student Award Item Reference. Returns all Student                  Preliminary Awards if no Reference ID or criteria is provided.
Returns Student Sponsor Contracts by Reference ID, or returns all Student Sponsor                  Contracts if no Reference ID is provided.
COD Counseling Data Load
COD Disbursement Status Data Load
COD IBT Data Load - Find Student by SSN, DOB and Last Name. Update all awards by Award                  Year and Federal Program ID with the IBT ID and IBT Completion Date.
COD MPN Data Load - Find Student by SSN, DOB and Last Name. Create or update MPN Certification.
COD Origination Status Data Load
This task edits Class Standing Overrides for existing Financial Aid Period Records                  by reference.

This process uses a Put-type web service operation to load a large number of External                  Awards for students. External Awards contain information from external agencies about                  potentially award-eligible students. An Import External Awards request will subsequently                  kick off the Packaging process to deliver these awards to the Students.
High Volume Import ISIR File Web Service

Imports Legacy Financial Aid Packages. Workday will provide a web service implementers                  can use to import student packaging results from their legacy system. If any validations                  fail during the import, the line containing the validation should be skipped and not                  imported.

This task edits the Load Status Overrides for existing Financial Aid Period Records                  by reference. Empty values for Load Status Overrides will make the system use the                  calculated Load Status (default behavior).
High-Volume web service to import many NSLDS Transactions.
This task edits Various Period Details Overridden for existing Financial Aid Period                  Records by reference.

This task can edit existing Student Period Records by the Student Period Record reference                  ID, or by supplying a student and an academic period. It will use the student's active                  student record and pick the Student Period Record based on academic period.
High Volume Import ISIR File (specifically for updating Transaction Statuses for ISIR                  Transactions) Web Service.

Imports Student Aggregate Awards. The post-processing of this web service task expects                  that all Student Aggregate Awards created via a single Import request will be for                  a single Student.
Web Service used to import the Student Alternative Loan Application Disbursement Roster.
Use this web service when you have a high volume of student alternative loan applications                  to import.

This process uses a Put-type web service operation to load Student Federal Aid Eligibility                  Codes for a large number of Students. However, instead of loading all the Student                  Eligibility Codes in a single transaction, the Import Web Service Process splits up                  the request into smaller chunks that are processed in separate XpressO Jobs.
Student Loan Application Credit Status Data Load
Use this web service when you have a high volume of student loan applications to import.

Imports a single Student Sponsor Contract with multiple lines. Lines can be added                  or edited by ID. When editing a sponsor contract, leaving out existing contracts lines                  will not remove them from the contract.

This task will take a reference to a Student and a Transfer Monitoring Date and updates                  the Student with the new date. If the date is omitted, it will clear the student's                  Transfer Monitoring Date
TEACH Grant Agreement to Serve
Background Process to import TEACH Grant Entrance Counseling Completion

This task creates new financial aid packages with the supplied student award data                  for the given student on their record denoted by the institutional academic unit.                  The student awards on the request will override any current awards in the student's                  financial aid. Any student waivers or student sponsor contracts on an existing financial                  aid package will be added to the newly created package of the same academic period.

Updates the Academic Year Start and End Dates, Loan Period Start and End Dates, and                  First and Second Anticipated Disbursement Dates for awards that match the specified                  Academic Record or Student Application, Award Year, Award Item, and Sequence Number

Creates or updates a Student Award Grouper with the student award information overrides.                  This web service sends the overridden values to COD when you launch the COD Outbound                  integration. This web service clears the fields you don't include in the override                  request. This web service is equivalent to the Edit COD Information task.

Creates or updates a Student Anticipated Disbursement with the disbursement COD data                  overrides. This web service sends the overridden values to COD when you launch the                  COD Outbound integration. This web service clears the fields you don't include in                  the override request. This web service is equivalent to the Edit COD Information task.

This task can be used to update the Federal Verification Status for a Student given                  a Financial Aid Award Year and Federal School Code Rule Set.                                    Note that this task is update only, it may not be used to assign a Student a Federal                  Verification Status if they do not yet have an ISIR transaction
Put operation for ISIR Transaction and ISIR Transaction Data
Creates a new Financial Aid Period Record NSLDS Override (or updates an existing Financial                  Aid Period Record NSLDS Override) with the information supplied in the request.
Web Service to add or update Pell grant crossover.
Sets the Programs of Studies used for Enrollment for an input Financial Aid Record.
Put operation for ISIR Transaction that updates the ISIR's Transaction Status from                  "Ready to Transmit" to "Transmitted"
Creates a new Student Alternative Loan Application (or updates an existing Student                  Alternative Loan Application) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Award Item (or updates an existing Student Award Item) with                  the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Loan Application (or updates an existing Student Loan Application)                  with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Preliminary Award (or updates an existing Student Preliminary                  Award) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Sponsor Contract (or updates an existing <Class Name>) with                  the information supplied in the request.
